text: Uye kana Chitsauko (cheQur’aan) chikadzikiswa, chichivakurudzira kutenda kuna Allah nekushinga zvakasimba uye kurwa pamwechete nemutumwa wavo (SAW), vapfumi mukati mavo vanokukumbira mvumo yako (kuti iwe uvasiye pakunorwa), uye vanoti: “Tisiye (tisare), tichange tiine avo vanogara (mudzimba).”
